string.name: personalDetails
string.ol:
Please Do Fill All Applicable Fields Carefully, And the same entered details will be forwarded to the Companies.\n
Try to fill bellow information using Desktop/Laptop, Because there are nearly 40+ Fields to Enter.
Registration and Update will be Enable only For few days, So Fill All the Fields at the Earliest.
Students are required to fill their 10th, 12th, Diploma and BE (semester wise,cgpa) marks without fail.
Do not round off the marks (For eg. 59.6% = 59.6% only and not 60%).
Students Who have attempted make up exams and have cleared the subject will be considered as history of backlogs.
